edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.util

Class HashArray<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.util.HashArray<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type
    V - Value type

    public class HashArray<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    HashMap with Keys mapped to Arrays of Values.
    Author:
    bowenzhi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HashArray()
      Initializes a HashArray of initial array size 10 per key
